page.title: 18Blandford - Organisations
page.content: There are various Youth Organisations in the town-Scouts,Guides,Cubs,Beavers and Brownies are very popular and have waiting lists of children hoping to be come members.There are units of the Army and Air Cadets.The Air Cadets lead parades with their Drum and Bugle Band. For girls there are three groups of Majorettes who join in the Carnival procession. There are also Youth Clubs attached to the Churches as well as a County Youth Club. Gymnastics,Boxing, Swimming and Judo Clubs are also very popular. For adults-as well as helping with all of those clubs-Red Cross,WRVS are also happy to have members. There are numerous Sports Clubs including the new Sports Centre for adults. Indeed there is no need to be bored in Blandford. {Peggy Toop
